item.title: Manja
item.description: Maanja is the dubbed Telugu version of Kannada Crime Thriller ‘Care of Footpath 2’. It’s an anecdote about the millions of juvenile delinquents living in the slums of India; the environment which fosters their behavior; and how society - the public, the judiciary, the media and the police reacts. Under strange circumstances, four teenage friends are provoked to plan the murder of a senior police inspector. The youths are arrested and tried, which creates a media sensation. Non-governmental organizations try to reform the four juveniles while the public and police want them killed. The society pushes them to the wall and they struggle to reform in the face of these adversities. Who’s going to have the final say? Tune in to find out!
item.tags: Manja, Movie, Full Movie, Drama, Whacked Out Media, Telugu Movie, Telugu

item.title: Red
item.description: Shekar is a businessman who lives with his wife Kamini. Kamini meets Raj a criminal, who cons women from rich family. She gets impressed by his paintings and fall in love with him. Kamini's husbands, Shekar comes to know the affair between his wife and Raj, he plots a plan with Raj to kill her.
item.tags: Red, Movie, Full Movie, Drama, Whacked Out Media, Telugu Movie, Telugu

item.title: Sitara
item.description: Raghuram is a popular director who plans a movie with all the newcomers. In this process, he comes across Sitara assuming that she would be the perfect fit for the role and shortlists her for the final cast. During the film’s shoot, Raghuram realizes that he has fallen in love with Sitara who shares the same feeling for her co-star Ashwin. Acting on this, a jealous Raghuram starts behaving in a dreadful manner with her. The twist in the tale arises when Sitara gets killed on the sets in a cynical manner. Was it an alleged suicide or was it Raghuram’s plan all through?
item.tags: Sitara, Movie, Full Movie, Drama, Whacked Out Media, Telugu Movie, Telugu

item.title: Bommala Ramaram
item.description: Ramanna is a small-time feudal lord in Bommala Ramaram village. Being a cruel man that he is, Ramanna keeps his father’s dead body for over two days just for the sake of property. One fine day, Ramanna sets his eyes on his ancestral property as well as his late father’s MLA post.In this process, Ramanna takes help of Soori who leads life by mediating settlements in the village. Ramanna faces a series of issues with village authorities and this leads to Soori’s imprisonment in a murder case. The rest of the story is all about how the lives of these two people who chose the path of crime end.
item.tags: Bommala Ramaram, Movie, Full Movie, Drama, Whacked Out Media, Telugu Movie, Telugu

item.title: Kabali
item.description: Kabaleeswaran, a revolutionary who fights for the betterment of his race in a foreign land, is falsely implicated and thrown behind bars. When he returns after his prison term, he starts a search for his wife and ends up confronting those who were the reason behind his miseries. What follows is a tale of revenge, emotion, drama, jealousy, treason, loyalty, love and payback.

item.title: Barefoot To Goa
item.description: A parable on the moribund human bonds in a fast-paced world, which is a warning that poignantly highlights the futility of life and death. The movie is a social commentary on the great rural-urban divide in India; a vivid canvas to depict the dichotomy between the two Indias and the manner in which their inhabitants think, behave, act, and live. How a selfish daughter-in-law living in the comfort of a middle-class urban settlement deliberately tries to cut all the ties between her husband and his aging mother. How a destitute, deaf-and-dumb rural couple selflessly shower their hospitality on total strangers.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, Barefoot To Goa, Prakhar Morchhale, Saara Nahar, Shemaroo Full Movies, Drama

item.title: X: Past Is Present
item.description: A middle-aged director meets a young beautiful girl in a bar and while talking to her remembers his passionate moments lived with 10 different women in the various phases of his life beginning from the early years. The undisclosed interactions with these women get conceived by 11 creative directors on screen in their own distinctive way focusing on love, attraction, sex, lust, anger and much more.

item.title: Hunterrr
item.description: Mandar Ponkshe is an ordinary guy who does not attract attention because he wants to be seen as ordinary. But behind that facade is a story - of an interesting past life that has been led. His single-minded pursuit of girls, tall and short, stout or with a pout. His friends have lost all hope of him settling down, as they know that he doesn't plan to. And then suddenly he meets someone whom he starts liking and falls in love with. What will happen now? Will she concile with his past? Will he able to hide his Hunterrrr reputation?
